actions.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 104-442, by Mr. McInnis.

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 2677 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit. Providing for the consideration of the bill in the House. A specified amendment is in order. The amendment printed in the report accompanying this resolution shall be considered as adopted.
Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 173.
Mr. Solomon asked unanimous consent that H. Res. 323 be laid on the table. Agreed to without objection.

official_title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 2677) to require the Secretary of the Interior to accept from a State donations of services of State employees to perform, in a period of Government budgetary shutdown, otherwise authorized functions in any unit of the National Wildlife Refuge System or the National Park System.

summary.text: Sets forth the closed rule for the consideration of H.R. 2677 (performance by State employees of Department of the Interior personnel functions in a period of Government budgetary shutdown).

titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 2677) to require the Secretary of the Interior to accept from a State donations of services of State employees to perform, in a period of Government budgetary shutdown, otherwise authorized functions in any unit of the National Wildlife Refuge System or the National Park System.
